title: utcoco Women's Flowy Denim Dress 2025 Vacation Lapel Long Puff Sleeve Button Down A Line Swing Ruffle Jean Dress
description: 【MATERIAL】Specially selected high-quality denim fabric, this classic blue denim dress is soft, skin-friendly and durable. comfortable to wear through the day. Keeping you all day comfort and stylish. Suitable for wearing in Spring, Fall and Winter. Essential denim dress in the wardrobe!

【FEATURES】This blue denim shirt dress features button up clouse, turn down collar, Long Puff Sleeve, Elastic Slim waist design, 2 chest pockets, Knee length, Ruffle swing hem, popular midi Jean dress. Noble and fashionable. Design is simple and elegant, suitable for daily casual wear.

【MATCH】Perfectly wearing a wide brimmed straw hat, Large woven bag, bracelet, necklace, etc. The overall design is casual and has a vacation style. Stylish and Vintage. Western cowboy style. Pair of high boots, which are not only warm but also trendy.
【OCCASION】Perfect for daliy wear, vacation, work office, lounge wear, festivals, date, holiday, gifts party, night activities, going out, chic street, shopping, photography, ceremony, banquet, etc.

【TIPS】Please measure your bust circumference and refer to the seller's size chart before placing an order, not Amazon's size chart, if you are not sure about the size, please contact us without hesitation, Hand/Machine wash, do not bleach, hang or line dry, non-iron.
